```{r}
library(pracma)

dist_conversion <- function(lat1,lat2,lon1,lon2){
    lon1 = deg2rad(lon1)
    lon2 = deg2rad(lon2)
    lat1 = deg2rad(lat1)
    lat2 = deg2rad(lat2)
      
    # Haversine formula
    dlon = lon2 - lon1
    dlat = lat2 - lat1
    a = sin(dlat / 2)**2 + cos(lat1) * cos(lat2) * sin(dlon / 2)**2
 
    c = 2 * asin(sqrt(a))
    
    # Radius of earth in kilometers. Use 3956 for miles
    r = 3956
      
    # calculate the result
    return(c * r)
}

```

```{r}
uber_dist <- uber_fare_mod %>% mutate(distance = dist_conversion(pickup_latitude_mod, pickup_longitude_mod, dropoff_latitude_mod, dropoff_longitude_mod)) %>% filter(distance > 0)

glimpse(uber_dist)
```
